content.question: Which research method is most likely utilized in a study exploring the biopsychosocial causes of bipolar disorder by extensively examining the personal history, symptoms, and treatment outcomes for the small group of individuals who first showed symptoms after age 60?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
